text: Ceratozamia robusta is a species of plant in the family Zamiaceae. It is found in Belize, Guatemala, and Mexico (in Chiapas, Oaxaca, and Veracruz). Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical moist lowland forests. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== robusta Category:Flora of Belize Category:Flora of Guatemala Category:Flora of Chiapas Category:Flora of Oaxaca Category:Flora of Veracruz Category:Endangered plants Category:Endangered biota of Mexico Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Ceratozamia robusta
